info.title: Vim API
info.description:
Vim platform was built to help payers and providers succeed in a value-based world. 
 
 The Vim API is designed to provide you with all that you need to enable provider search and booking from your website or mobile app. 
 
Vim's API is organized around the [REST](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Representational_state_transfer) methodology. It uses resource-oriented URLs, and common HTTP response codes to indicate API errors. 

All requests are authenticated using an `x-api-key` header which is provided by Vim, alongside an `authorization` header. Certain requests may require a secret that will be provided by Vim. These endpoints will be marked with a `Backend` mark. Make sure that this secret is not exposed to a third party.

tags.name: Provider
tags.description: The Provider data model enables you to search for providers by various criteria and provides relevant information about providers, including information to support a booking process.

tags.name: Patient
tags.description: The Patient data model is intended to provide the relevant information about the patient, to support the booking experience

tags.name: Appointment
tags.description: The Appointment data model is used to send appointment or appointment requests to the provider's office.

post.description: For a specific provider, returns extended provider information, appointment types and available time slots for a given date range. Also returns the scheduling configuration of the chosen provider and API key.

parameters.name: x-api-key
parameters.description: API key provided by Vim for authentication.

parameters.name: x-insurer
parameters.description: insurer of the patient

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer authorization token obtained from /auth/getJwt endpoint.

parameters.name: npi
parameters.description: NPI of the chosen provider.

post.x-amazon-apigateway-request-validator: Validate body, query string parameters, and headers

post.description: The free-text endpoint returns supported search terms for any free text input. It can be used, for example, to power a typeahead and/or autocomplete component. It also supports typos and colloquial names for providers. For instance, for the search term "heart", this endpoint may return the following search terms: "heart surgeon", "heart attack", "John Hart, MD", "Heart and Vascular Institute".

post.description: The "find" endpoint returns a ranked list of providers based on the requested search criteria. The search criteria may include search terms (conditions, procedures, specialties, etc.), filters, location and other patient attributes that may affect the ranking, such as patient insurance.

RelationshipToPrimaryMember.description: member relation to the insurance owner

zip.description: The member's zip. Must be 5 or 9 digits

refresh_token.description: Refresh token provided in a call to /auth/getJwt

appointmentRequestId.description: Unique identifier for the submitted request

appointmentId.description: Vim's internal identifier for the submitted appointment

address.example: 4100 Lake Otis Parkway Suite 322 322, Anchorage, AK

appointmentTypeId.description: chosen appointment type ID, must be one of the values returned in a provider/getBookingData response.

startTime.description: the start time of the appointment

endTime.description: the end time of the appointment

providers.description: list of providers and their availability

address.example: 4100 Lake Otis Parkway Suite 322 322, Anchorage, AK

appointmentTypes.description: list of appointment types that the providers offers at the chosen location

isTelemedicine.description: indicates whether appointment type is telemedicine

nextAvailableSlot.description: provider's next available appointment (only relevant for booking).

npiType.description: Npi type, either an individual or an organization. If not entered, the default is an individual

openHours.description: The provider's working hours grouped by days (Exmaple: { Mon: { open: '08:00', close: '17:00' } } )

open.description: 24h representation of the opening time (provider's timezone)

close.description: 24h representation of the closing time (provider's timezone)

appointmentTypes.description: list of appointment types that the providers offers at the chosen location

isTelemedicine.description: indicates whether appointment type is telemedicine

nextAvailableSlot.description: provider's next available appointment (only relevant for booking).

questionnaire.description: questions that the patient is required to answer before booking the appointment. The answer to some of the question may prevent the member from booking. The answers to these questions should be included in the BookRequest.

questionType.description: the type of question, either an open question or a multiple choice

question.description: the actual question for the patient to answer

goto.description: the ID of the next question to ask

questionType.description: the type of question, either an open question or a multiple choice question.

question.description: the actual question for the patient to answer
question.example: Do you have a family history of colorectal cancer?

memberToken.description: Member token obtained from the identifyPatient endpoint. Provider's availability can, in some scenarios, change based on the patient's attributes.

providers.description: the providers for whom you would like to get availability, limited for 20 providers

address.example: 4100 LAKE OTIS PKWY STE. 322, ANCHORAGE, AK

startDateTime.description: Beginning date to start searching for time slots. If not provided, defaults to the date of the request

endDateTime.description: End date to stop searching for time slots. If not provided, defaults to one week after the start parameter. Limited to 28 days after start parameter.

npiType.description: Npi type, either an individual or an organization. If not entered, the default is an individual

freeText.description: Free text to match against Vim's search terms

memberToken.description: Member token obtained from the identifyPatient endpoint. Certain member attributes can affect the provider's ranking in the search results, for example a provider that accepts the member's insurer would rank higher than providers that do not.

Member token obtained from the identifyPatient endpoint. Certain member attributes can affect the provider's ranking in the search results, for example a provider that accepts the member's insurer would rank higher than providers that do not.

patientGender.description: Used to improve results order using providers' clinical match

patientAge.description: Used to improve results order using providers' clinical match

icd.description: ICD10 code. Used to improve results' clinical match

cpt.description: CPT code. Used to improve results' clinical match

etg.description: Clinical epiosde name. Used to improve results' clinical match

searchFilters.title: Search API filters
searchFilters.description: Filters to be used in the search. Only Results that match the filters would be returned.

onlyInNetwork.description: returns only in-network providers. When used must pass plan parameter or verified memberToken

spokenLanguage.description: Language code in ISO 639-1 format. For full list look at https://www.constitution.org/lg/languagecode.html

address.example: 4100 Lake Otis Parkway Suite 322 322, Anchorage, AK

appointmentTypeId.description: chosen appointment type ID, must be one of the values returned in a provider/getBookingData response.

timePreferences.description: patient's time preferences for the appointment

optionalTimes.description: patient's selected available appointments time slots

providers.description: list of providers and their next availability

address.example: 4100 LAKE OTIS PKWY STE. 322, ANCHORAGE, AK

appointmentTypes.description: list of appointment types that the providers offers at the chosen location

isTelemedicine.description: indicates whether appointment type is telemedicine

memberToken.description: the specific member for which this response applies, if provided in the request.

appointmentId.description: Unique identifier for the booked appointment

address.example: 4100 Lake Otis Parkway Suite 322 322, Anchorage, AK

appointmentTypeId.description: chosen appointment type ID, must be one of the values returned in a provider/getBookingData response.

timePreferences.description: patient's time preferences for the appointment

optionalTimes.description: patient's selected available appointments time slots

reasonForVisit.description: free text reason for visit provided by the patient

memberToken.description: member's unique identifier, obtained from the IdentifyMember endpoint

questionnaire.description: patient's answers to questions required by the provider, as a prerequisite for booking

questionId.description: the id of the question being answered

requestToExpedite.description: Whether to request the provider to try and expedite the appointment to sooner time if one becomes available

appointmentTypeId.description: chosen appointment type ID, must be one of the values returned in a provider/getBookingData response.

startDateTime.description: the start time of the appointment in UTC

reasonForVisit.description: free text reason for visit provided by the patient

requestToken.description: booking request unique identifier, obtained from concierge booking request

memberToken.description: member's unique identifier, obtained from the IdentifyMember endpoint

memberId.description: The member's id in the insurance company

BookRequest.description: Books an appointment for a patient at the provider's office

npiType.description: Npi type, either an individual or an organization. If not entered, the default is an individual

address.example: 4100 Lake Otis Parkway Suite 322 322, Anchorage, AK

appointmentTypeId.description: chosen appointment type ID, must be one of the values returned in a provider/getBookingData response.

startDateTime.description: the requested start time of the appointment

reasonForVisit.description: free text reason for visit provided by the patient

ehrInsuranceId.description: optional, the id of the insurance the ehr is familiar with

memberToken.description: member's unique identifier, obtained from the IdentifyMember endpoint

questionnaire.description: patient's answers to questions required by the provider, as a prerequisite for booking

questionId.description: the id of the question being answered

requestToExpedite.description: Whether to request the provider to try and expedite the appointment to sooner time if one becomes available

memberToken.description: patient's unique identifier, to be used in other requests such as /appointment/book or /appointment/request

verificationStatus.description: indicates whether or not Vim verified the member's insurance

getPatientAppointmentsRequest.description: returns all of the patient's appointments that were booked through Vim

appointments.description: patient's appointments that were booked through Vim

locations.description: All of the providers locations that match the search criteria. Locations are ordered based on their match score.

address.description: Full address of the provider office

distance.description: Distance from specified geo in miles.

appointmentTypes.description: list of appointment types that the providers offers at the chosen location

nextAvailableSlot.description: provider's next available appointment (only relevant for booking).

profilePicture.description: URL for the provider's profile picture.
URL of the provider's profile picture.

address.description: Full address of the provider office

appointmentTypes.description: list of appointment types that the providers offers at the chosen location

nextAvailableSlot.description: provider's next available appointment (only relevant for booking).

profilePicture.description: URL of the provider's profile picture.

geo.description: The relevant geographical area to search in. Can be zip code, state or latitude/longitude pair of coordinates. If multiple properties are provided, only the first one will be taken in account in the following order: geocode, address, zip

searchTerm.description: The matching search term to be used in the "find" endpoint.

type.description: the filter type we can pass as a filter param. For example, type taxonomy

value.description: The value of the filter. For example, a specific taxonomy

distance.description: Distance from the clinic in miles.
